title: rustc panics when documenting rustix <= v0.36.12

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
I've stumbled upon a bug documenting the crate `rustix` in version `0.36.8`. This only happens with the current stable release. I've tested the rustix versions `0.36.8..=0.36.13` and all those are affected *expect* 0.36.13. To reproduce, create a new rust project, add ```toml [dependencies] rustix = "=0.36.8" ``` and run `cargo +stable doc`. I don't know if this is relevant anymore, because it does not happen with `beta` or `nightly`, neither with a newer version of rustix, but i thought you may be interested in this. ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.69.0 (84c898d65 2023-04-16) binary: rustc commit-hash: 84c898d65adf2f39a5a98507f1fe0ce10a2b8dbc commit-date: 2023-04-16 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.69.0 LLVM version: 15.0.7 ``` ### Error output ``` error: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.69.0 (84c898d65 2023-04-16) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: --crate-type lib note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: #0 [doc_link_resolutions] resolutions for documentation links for a module end of query stack error: could not document `rustix` Caused by: process didn't exit successfully: `rustdoc --edition=2018 --crate-type lib --crate-name rustix /.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/rustix-0.36.0/src/lib.rs --cap-lints allow -o /devel/src/rust_testing/target/doc --cfg 'feature="default"' --cfg 'feature="io-lifetimes"' --cfg 'feature="libc"' --cfg 'feature="std"' --cfg 'feature="use-libc-auxv"' --error-format=json --json=diagnostic-rendered-ansi,artifacts,future-incompat --diagnostic-width=139 -C metadata=d3fd44915dadc1f9 -L dependency=/devel/src/rust_testing/target/debug/deps --extern bitflags=/devel/src/rust_testing/target/debug/deps/libbitflags-1a1c34f79f6e612c.rmeta --extern io_lifetimes=/devel/src/rust_testing/target/debug/deps/libio_lifetimes-5e595f7cc27b1bba.rmeta --extern libc=/devel/src/rust_testing/target/debug/deps/liblibc-6f3f707741fc0a21.rmeta --extern linux_raw_sys=/devel/src/rust_testing/target/debug/deps/liblinux_raw_sys-a98848148f479f38.rmeta --crate-version 0.36.0 --cfg linux_raw --cfg asm` (exit status: 101) warning: build failed, waiting for other jobs to finish... ```
